runs.comm: left alone outside the off stump
on the pads and Smith just clips it away to the midwicket fence... got well inside the line and lofted it over the fielder inside the circle
bit of an edge and the ball rolls down to thirdman for a single
again down to third man, Fletcher off the mark first ball
goes for the cut, ball rolls off the outer half of the bat to the cover region
played away on the off side, fielder moves in quickly and cuts off the single. End of a... well end of the first over.
back of a length, Fletcher goes on the back-foot and punches it back past the bowler
defensively played away on the off side and once that is safely done Fletcher rehearses a shot that could have added a few to the total
and that was for nothing after all! good length delivery - Fletcher makes a bit of room and lofts it over the fence. Good clean hit straight back over the bowler. Just as rehearsed!
played away on the off side
played away behind point and they scamper through for a single
played back past the bowler, man at mid-off moves across quickly but fails to cut off the single.
hit on the pad, no real appeal there. Smith was looking to play it away on the on-side
swing, a bad one at that and the ball rolls away off the inside edge. Throw hits the stumps at the non-striker's end but no damage done. Smith actually missed out there as the ball was bit short
slower delivery, played away
take that! pitched up, right in the slot and Fletcher lofts it straight back over the bowler's head and the man at long-off had no chance whatsoever
swing and a miss this time, again pitched but this time no contact
better... played away in front of square and they scamper through for a single, ball clips the stumps at the non-striker's end and this time they go through for the second
played away for an easy single
looks to work away on the on-side but fails to find the gap
gets it right this time, finds the gap on the leg side, the first run is taken quickly and they scamper through for the second...well run
turned away on the leg side
cut away towards point
worked away on the leg side, midwicket moves across and cuts off the single
Cusack strikes! bit outside the off stump, Fletcher goes after it and ends up with a decent edge to the keeper. No one drops those!
played away towards cover
played away behind square on the off side, no single
taps it away behind the stumps on the off side
gets forward and defends it back to the bowler
wicket maiden! that is rare - Samuels had no intention of scoring there, just played it away on the off side
looks to paddle it away but fails to get it past the fielder at short fine leg
dropped! lofted away to long-on, got the height but no the length and the man in the deep fails to hold on to a hard chance
looks to drive, inside edge on to the pad and the ball rolls away harmlessly
down to long-on, easy single
punched back to the bowler, looks like Samuels is not that interested in getting off the mark
another dot ball and the run rate is dropping.

caught at point! that was a great catch, diving to his left. Was short and Smith threw his bat at it, probably trying to tell Samules how it should be done but the end result of the lesson is disastrous.
punched back to the bowler, no run
short ball and cuts away past the fielder inside the circle
played away to deep cover, finally they manage to take a run off Cusack!
defended watchfully
played down to mid-on
steered down to third man for a single
punched away on the off side, easy single
pushed away on the off side, straight to the man at extra cover
down the leg side, Thompson starts off bit wayward
driven through extra cover, excellent timing and even better placement
steered down to third man for a single
cut down to third man for a single, more a square drive - opened the face of the bat
played away to deep cover
edge and taken! slower delivery outside the off stump, Samuels looks to driven on the off, ball clips the edge and goes straight to the keeper.
played to deep midwicket
again played away on the leg side
played down to third man
looks to steer it down to third man but fails to beat the man inside the circle
taps it away to extra cover, no room for a single there
pushed away towards point, early call and that's a superb run
comes forward and played away on the onside, fielders close in quickly to cut off the single
played down the ground, O'Brien gets his leg across and stops the ball
covers up and plays it down the track, again not really looking to score
played down to long-off, this time they are forced to take the single! what will the world say kind of run
played down to mid-on
played away through midwicket, another easy single to end the over.
comes back in and gets hit on the pad
cut away off the back-foot, diving effort at short third man fails to cuts it off and the ball races away to the fence. That's better
pushed it to covers and they cross over, well run
down to long-on for a single
Bravo too plays one down to long-on. Bravo was looking for a quick one and never looked up to see if the non-striker was interested
decent throw comes in at the bowler's end and the bails are off
dropped in the deep and they come back for the second
defended down the track
swing and a miss outside the off stump, Russell is in a hurry
edged behind the stumps and they cross over
played down to long-off, single to end the over

cut away and sweeper moves across and picks it up. Clearly the pitch is on the slower side and run make is not going to be that easy. Ireland batsmen could prove me wrong like they did in the first match
punched down to mid-on
taps away off the crease, no room for a single there
played in the air to long-on, was in the air but falls well safe
hits it down to long-on, another single added to the total
comes forward and plays it away past the cover fielder, sweeper cleans up
goes back and plays it behind square
swings it away through midwicket, another single
gone! hit on the pad, right in front of the stumps and up goes the finger. West Indies 5 down and sinking fast here.
defended to midwicket
played away towards cover
slaps it away in the air, was a short ball and Russell was looking to pull but got nowhere near the line
pulled away to deep midwicket, another short ball on a slow track - not a bad ploy as timing the shot is not that easy
another short ball and this time Russell goes for the pulls and hits it hard and flat to deep midwicket, bit of a hard chance dropped
another good short ball, Sammy played it down and gets a single for it

goodness me! the oldest trick in the book and Russell falls for it! a few short balls and then the yorker. Murtagh gets it right and Russell ends up playing all over it. Woodwork shattered - West Indies being shredded here
pulled straight to the man at deep midwicket
driven down the ground
beaten outside the off stump. 3.0- 1- 6-3  how is that for bowling figures!
steered down to third man
down the leg side
driven straight back, ball clips the stumps and runs down
fulltoss and Badree drops it down and they scamper through
driven down to long-off, another fulltoss and they just get a single out of it,
again played down the ground
worked away on the onside for a single
goes for the big one but fails to make contact
lofted away to midwicket, one bounce and straight to the fielder there
Cusack is the man! drives in the air and back down the track - Cusack holds on well to a decent chance
down to long-off, fielder in the deep comes in for the catch but fails to get there on time
hits it down to midwicket
